topic.title: Program Management
topic.abstract:
Program Management provides a structure for engaging and managing defined a defined set of tasks that must be successfully completed to identify participants as meeting a level of standards or proficiency. The application supports an array of functional areas can include:
Certification - validate a Contacts proficiency in a given arena
Accreditation - verify an Account meets the standards and/or regulations of associated industry
Continuing Education - track and manage ongoing education opportunities
